bug_report.Summary: Unable to add an item to the cart
bug_report.Description: The button 'cart' isn't clickable in the page 'Favourite'
bug_report.STR: 1. Open app; 2. Go to the 'Market' page; 3. Add an item to the 'Favourite'; 4. Open page 'Favoutite'; 5. Click on button 'cart';
bug_report.Expected_result: 1. Button is clickable; 2. Item is added to the 'Cart' page
bug_report.Actual: 1. Button isn't clickable; 2. Item isn't added to the 'Cart' Page;
